description: This file defines a LightningJS component named 'NotesList' which displays a list of note cards, handles selection and deletion events, and manages empty state display.

classes.name: NotesList
classes.description: LightningJS component that renders a list of notes with handling for selection, deletion, and empty state.

methods.name: onSelect
methods.description: Handles note selection event, emitting 'select' to parent.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Handles note deletion event, emitting 'delete' to parent.

methods.name: calcX
methods.description: Calculates the x position for a note based on its index.

methods.name: calcY
methods.description: Calculates the y position for a note based on its index.

methods.name: $onSelect
methods.description: Internal wrapper for onSelect, possibly used as a template event handler.

methods.name: $onDelete
methods.description: Internal wrapper for onDelete, possibly used as a template event handler.
